value.title: Nuro self-driving car gets US DOT's blessing

Perhaps not the biggest splash, but in one small step for self-driving cars, Nuro's driverless R2 has received the first approved exemption from the US Department of Transportation. The exemption allows Nuro to operate its latest R2 self-driving car on public roads despite it having no human-driver controls.
